name: Picross NP Vol.5
description: Picross NP was a series of eight Picross games released exclusively on the Super Famicom in Japan and made only available via the Nintendo Power service. The games were released bi-monthly, from April 1999 to June 2000. All of these games were themed after Nintendo's most successful games and franchises, Vol.5's theme is The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.
